hideIcon: Hide Document Icons in the Tree
hideIconDescForce: Enable when the above switch is not effective, and only effective when the previous switch is on
hintDesc:
• ‚óè Made by zxkmm, open source under the MIT license.
  • ‚óè If you like this plugin, please light up the free star‚≠ê (Star) for my GitHub repository.
  • ‚óè Link: https://github.com/zxkmm/siyuan_doctree_compress
experimentFeatureHintDesc: (Maybe have compatible issue with 3rd party themes)
experimentFeatureHintTitle: <hr style='border: none; border-top: 3px solid;'>‚óè Dynamic Doctree layout Options
hintDangerousZoneTitle: <hr style='border: none; border-top: 3px solid;'>‚óè Static Doctree Layout Options
hintDangerousZoneDesc: (Maybe have compatible issue with 3rd party themes)
overloadFontSizeSwitchDesc: Once enabled, you can use the following settings to adjust the font size of the document tree
overloadFontSizeForceSwitchDesc: Enable when the above switch is not effective, and only effective when the previous switch is on
overloadFontSizePxDesc: Must check the above switch to take effect
mouseHoverZeroPadding: Flow Layout of Document Tree Items when Mouse Hovering
mouseHoverZeroPaddingDesc:
Convenient for clicking and viewing titles.
Read more details here
mouseHoverZeroPaddingForceDesc: Enable when the above switch is not effective, and only effective when the previous switch is on
mouseHoverZeroPaddingPxDesc: default value is 4 which is the default padding of the first level notbooks
mouseOverLineUnclampDesc: Convenient for clicking and viewing titles
mouseOverLineUnclampTitle: Unclamp lines in doctree, convenient for clicking and viewing titles
mouseOverLineUnclampForceDesc: Enable when the above switch is not effective, and only effective when the previous switch is on
mouseOverReduceFontSizeDesc: Convenient for clicking and viewing titles
mouseOverReduceFontSizeTitle: Reload font size when mouse hovering
mouseOverReduceFontSizeForceDesc: Enable when the above switch is not effective, and only effective when the previous switch is on
overloadLineHeightForceDesc: Enable when the above switch is not effective, and only effective when the previous switch is on
overloadLineHeightPxDesc: Must check the above switch to take effect, default: 28 unit: px
addCurrentDeviceIntoListDesc: When you click the button, the interface will be reloaded, and unsaved configurations will be lost, so please save other configuration items before clicking the button
addCurrentDeviceIntoList: Add current device into the list
enableDeviceListDesc: This list is used to control which device should enable this plugin on, please try not to modify it manually
onlyEnableListedDevicesDesc: If checked, this plugin will only enable on the devices in the list
hintDeviceSpecificSettingsDesc: These options letting you control which device should enable this plugin on
hintDeviceSpecificSettingsTitle: <hr style='border: none; border-top: 3px solid;'>‚óè Devices Specific Options
removeCurrentDeviceFromList: Remove current device from the list
removeCurrentDeviceFromListDesc: When you click the button, the interface will be reloaded, and unsaved configurations will be lost, so please save other configuration items before clicking the button
hideContextualLabelDesc: Hide the hovering label of the current document in the document tree
displayIconButDisableIconClickDesc: Display icons but disable icon click
disableDocumentButtonsPopupDesc: Disable document buttons popup when mouse hovering
enableDoctreeFrontLineDesc: Enable Doctree Front Line, you must turn off custom padding and flow layout to take effect
doctreeFrontLinePositionDesc: Define doctree Front Line Position, default is 20, unit: px
doctreeFrontLinePaddingDesc: Define doctree Front Line Padding, default is 20, unit: px
doctreeFrontLineBorderDesc: Define doctree Front Line Border, default is 2, unit: px
docTreeFrontLineImplememtationDesc: Define the doctree front line style
doctreeSeperateLineBorderDesc: Define doctree Seperate Line Border, default is 2, unit: px
addNotebookOutlineDesc:
Add notebook outline to the document tree.
by https://github.com/TCOTC aka @Jeffrey Chen
beggingDesc:
This plugin is open source and free, so I need your encouragement.
If you like the features this plugin brings you, you can consider donating to help me with basic living expenses üçö: Donate. (Donations won't unlock additional features)
If you're not financially comfortable, you can encourage me by giving a free ‚≠ê star to my GitHub repository.
If you or someone you know needs my skills, feel free to hire me anytime.
